examples.translation: 她的头部与身体大小不成比例。
examples.last: to the size of her body.

examples.translation: 我们正努力把问题缩小到可以控制的范围内。
examples.first: We are trying to reduce the problem to manageable

v: adjust in size relative to other things
n: the quotient obtained when the magnitude of a part is divided by the magnitude of the whole
balance among the parts of something
